sentences.speaker: B
sentences.english: Bomi, what do you do in your free time?
sentences.korean: 보미야, 너는 여가 시간에 무엇을 하니?

sentences.speaker: G
sentences.english: I often bake cookies. How about you, Tony?
sentences.korean: 나는 종종 쿠키를 구워. 너는 어때, Tony?

sentences.speaker: G
sentences.english: Yes, It's my favorite free time activity.

sentences.speaker: B
sentences.english: Who do you usually play with?

sentences.speaker: G
sentences.english: My dad. What do you do in your free time?
sentences.korean: 우리 아빠랑. 너는 여가 시간에 무엇을 하니?

sentences.speaker: B
sentences.english: I often go to the Han River and ride my bike.
sentences.korean: 나는 종종 한강에 가서 자전거를 타.
